Html:
If you want to know more about developing for Kinect for WIndows or just want to stay up to date with the latest news and so on, read www.kinectingforwindows.com and I'll try to help you out!

I'm planning a tutorial that will be released the 2nd of April for those who like!!

@HellScreammm: thanks! best places would be our website http://kinectforwindows.com or our blogs http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kinectforwindows/ (product blog) and http://blogs.msdn.com/b/k4wdev (developer blog).

what is your tutorial going to cover? i can't promise anything but is there some way we might help you?

Ben
